# primaryEdge

**Instance Property**

The side on which the primary view controller sits.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var primaryEdge: UISplitViewController.PrimaryEdge { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to change the default arrangement of the child view controllers. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISplitViewController/PrimaryEdge-swift.enum/leading].

## Positioning the primary view controller

- **UISplitViewController.PrimaryEdge**: Constants that indicate the side on which the primary view controller sits.
